```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(gfcmSTAR)
setwd("~/git/gfcm-devops/StockAssessmentResults/uploads/2021/WGSAD_Western_Mediterranean")
files <- dir()
for(i in 1:2) # length(files))
{
  cat("Reading", files[i], "...")
  x <- try(read.template.v10(files[i]))
  cat("done\n")
}
```

STAR_2019_DPS_5.xlsx does not specify whether the model used is VPA type.

STAR 2.1.2 should change formula from

if(vpa_type="Yes") then X else Y

to

if(vpa_type="Yes") then X else if(vpa_type="No") then Y else Error
